tag_list: c, php, python, linux, radio, audio
overview: Computer expert and operations analyst. He has worked in broadcast radio since 2002 where he demonstrated and honed his instincts in diagnosing computer problems. He has written software utility programs to provide integration between proprietary radio automation systems and open-source websites for dynamic content. His finest moment was reengineering a business’ operations with 250% productivity increase to enable two traffic reporters to send three announcements per hour to each of twelve local stations, and finally implementing the system on a remote server enabling the company to perform its operations in a decentralized home-office manner. His favorite pass-time is music, whether it’s writing his own synthesizer for the ultimate customization of his sound, or applying larger toolsets to sculpt the ideal sound for a particular medium.

degrees.subject: Computer Science and Information Systems
